events.title: Hit the Road! 🚗
events.description: Time to leave Vilnius behind! Flexible departure depending on when everyone's ready for the scenic hour drive.

events.title: Arrival at Lake Paradise 🏞️
events.description: Welcome to Moletai! Simple, warm welcome to our lakeside adventure base after the pleasant drive.

events.title: Campfire & Music 🔥
events.description: Guitars, stories, and quiet chats by the fire. Bring a blanket; stay for the stars.

events.title: Slow Breakfast Start 🥞
events.description: Rise and shine, Lithuania! Keep it easy, keep it social, keep it delicious.

events.title: Meet & Greet 👋
events.description: Names, laughs, and who's who. Fast intros, friendly faces.

events.title: Mixed-Culture Quiz Battle ⚔️
events.description: Slovenians vs Lithuanians? Nah! Mixed teams for maximum cultural chaos and fun!

events.title: Freedom Hour 🎵
events.description: Hammocks, lake dips, a nap—or do nothing at all.

events.title: Lunch Together 🍽️
events.description: Plates up, stories down the table. Recharge for the afternoon.

events.title: Park Explorer Mission 🚶‍♂️
events.description: Guided tour of the park - perfect for digesting lunch with some light movement and nature vibes.

events.title: Water & Games 🏊‍♂️
events.description: Cannonballs, frisbee, and cold drinks nearby.

events.title: Snacks & Reset 🍿
events.description: Top up snacks, change shirts, breathe, and reset.

events.title: Evening Program 🕺
events.description: Lights down, playlist up—dance if you want.

events.title: Slow Motion Morning ☕
events.description: Wake up slowly with coffee, quiet music, and peaceful morning walks. No rush, just vibes.

events.title: Brunch & Heart-to-Hearts 🥐
events.description: The perfect time to eat, chat, and soak in those last precious moments together.

events.title: Pack-Up & Memory Lane 📸
events.description: Photos, notes in the guestbook, and a tidy space for the road.

events.title: Road Trip Back to Vilnius 🚗
events.description: Hugs, bags, and one last wave. Safe drive back to Vilnius.
